text: @realDonaldTrump @narendramodi China was way ahead of Trump months ago a fact Trump fails to acknowledge. He's been a back runner in fighting Covid-19 from the getgo and even more so in helping others out. China has assisted over 89 plus nations & hasn't bellowed about it. They just did it because it was right
